verbose_text: It has been shown that c-Maf interacts with the transcription factor c-Myb to downregulate Bcl-2 expression and increase apoptosis in peripheral CD4 cells 47 and that c-Maf increases apoptosis by direct transactivation of caspase-6 in peripheral CD8 cells.
evidence: Bcl-2 expression and increase apoptosis in peripheral CD4 cells 47  and that c-Maf increases apoptosis
